definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail

sentences.english: Nicole, what kind of music was that? Samba, Salsa.
sentences.chinese: 妮可，當時是什麼音樂來着？桑巴舞，薩爾薩舞。

sentences.english: "Selecao", the nickname of the Brazil national team.
sentences.chinese: “桑巴軍團”是巴西國家足球隊的暱稱。

sentences.english: The other day, a man ran into me while doing the cell phone samba in the grocery store.
sentences.chinese: 前幾天我碰到一個人在雜貨店跳手機桑巴舞。

sentences.english: Capsicum grown on the eastern coast of Africa and in Zanzibar.
sentences.chinese: 辣椒非洲岸桑巴爾島椒屬豆夾研磨而。

sentences.english: You should try a bogo pogo in your samba, though.
sentences.chinese: 你最好在桑巴里加段碰恰恰試試。

sentences.english: There are hundreds of Samba schools in the town.
sentences.chinese: 有數百個桑巴舞學校的市鎮。

sentences.english: Sure, they can throw in a bit of the jogo bonito.
sentences.chinese: 當然他們可以把一些桑巴足球加進裏面。

sentences.english: And when the samba played, the sun would set so high.
sentences.chinese: 每當跳起桑巴舞的時候，太陽昇得老高。

sentences.english: Most people in Rio de Janeiro go to samba schools.
sentences.chinese: 大多數人民的里約熱內盧桑巴舞學校去。

definition: Latin/(in former times) to press-gang/to kidnap and force people into service
